text: avararinnittille? avarkkumump etra talamurakaleyan nam nasippiccat. ninnalkku nam ceytutannittillatta sekaryam bhumiyil namavarkk ceytukeatuttirunnu. avarkku nam manattuninn dharalamayi mala varsiccu. avarute talbhagattute pulakalealukkukayum ceytu. pinne avarute papannalute phalamayi namavare nasippiccu. avarkkupirake marru talamurakale valarttikkeantuvarikayum ceytu
